Uses of Class
com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.NodesForKey

  • Packages that use NodesForKey 
    Package Description
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.client
    Main public types for ClusterMate client module; most important of which is NetworkClient that is the object application code uses to access data in the logical distributed Store.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.cluster
    Package that contains client-side abstractions that deal with state of server, including rudimentary information about possible server clusters.
